column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Conclusion: Rated as the second biggest museum in America
column2: It's now first in my heart as the best museum I've visited so far.  It was busy
column3: but didn't feel crowded.   There's a cafe on the second floor
column4: but food is pricey and doesn't seem to be in optimal proportions.  They do serve beer and wine
column6: a must visit in your lifetime.
